county.title: County ID
county.description: Numeric ID of the county to scrape (e.g., 8 for the default example).

resultsPerPage.title: Results Per Page
resultsPerPage.description: Number of results to show per page.

pageStart.title: Start Page
pageStart.description: Page number to start scraping from.

pageEnd.title: End Page
pageEnd.description: Page number to stop scraping at. If null, scrapes until no results are found.

includeDetailPages.title: Include Detail Pages
includeDetailPages.description: If true, the crawler will visit each arrest's detail page for more information.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of pages processed in parallel.

minDelayMs.title: Minimum Delay (ms)
minDelayMs.description: Minimum delay between requests in milliseconds to avoid rate limiting.

emitWebhook.title: Emit Webhook
emitWebhook.description: If true, sends batch results to the specified webhook URL.

webhookUrl.title: Webhook URL
webhookUrl.description: The URL to send output data to via POST.
